channel.title: attack.t1136.001 on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in attack.t1136.001 on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Serv-U Exploitation CVE-2021-35211 by DEV-0322
item.description: Detects patterns as noticed in exploitation of Serv-U CVE-2021-35211 vulnerability by threat group DEV-0322

item.title: PowerShell Create Local User
item.description: Detects creation of a local user via PowerShell

item.title: Cisco Local Accounts
item.description: Find local accounts being created or modified as well as remote authentication configurations

item.title: Suspicious Windows ANONYMOUS LOGON Local Account Created
item.description: Detects the creation of suspicious accounts similar to ANONYMOUS LOGON, such as using additional spaces. Created as an covering detection for exclusion of Logon Type 3 from ANONYMOUS LOGON accounts.

item.title: Net.exe User Account Creation
item.description: Identifies creation of local users via the net.exe command.

item.title: Local User Creation
item.description: Detects local user creation on windows servers, which shouldn’t happen in an Active Directory environment. Apply this Sigma Use Case on your windows server logs and not on your DC logs.

item.title: Creation of a Local Hidden User Account by Registry
item.description: Sysmon registry detection of a local hidden user account.

item.title: Creation Of A Local User Account
item.description: Detects the creation of a new user account. Such accounts may be used for persistence that do not require persistent remote access tools to be deployed on the system.

item.title: Creation Of An User Account
item.description: Detects the creation of a new user account. Such accounts may be used for persistence that do not require persistent remote access tools to be deployed on the system.

item.title: Hidden Local User Creation
item.description: Detects the creation of a local hidden user account which should not happen for event ID 4720.

item.title: Suspicious Add User to Remote Desktop Users Group
item.description: Detects suspicious command line in which a user gets added to the local Remote Desktop Users group
